Name: Hemp
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring, summer, or fall. Takes 8 days to mature, afterwards it continues to produce every 2 days.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plantalo en la primavera, verano o otoño. Tarda 8 días en madurar, luego continua produciendo cada 2 días.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄, 여름이나 가을에 심으세요. 성숙 기간은 8일이며, 다 자란 후 2일마다 수확할 수 있다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen Sie diese im Frühjahr, Sommer oder Herbst. Die Reifezeit beträgt 8 Tage. Danach wird die Produktion alle 2 Tage fortgesetzt.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-a na primavera, verão ou outono. Leva 8 dias para amadurecer e continua produzindo a cada 2 dias
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天、夏天或秋天播种。8天成熟，之后每两天收获一次。
